text:
Thanks <@U22PJPGK0>! I'll do that until 'soon' arrives.

I have another question for anyone who has tried this. I'm trying to submit information to my HubDB table through use of a form and have figured it out for the most part, but I am currently struggling with adding the results of a <select> field to the corresponding column. Image fields appear to be causing the same error.

Any ideas?
for a select field, youâ€™ll just submit the id value of the option. For images, just the url of the image
